int  channel 
)

calculate the summary stats for a given probeset

Loop though an open cel file and fill in the statistics for each probe subset.

Parameters:
cel - Filehandle to open cel file
probeSets - list of probelist
chipStats - cumulative stats object to compute statistics
channel - purely for logging purposes report the channel
masks - Different probe subsets to calculate stats for.
cel - Cel file to get data from.
chipStats - Vector to fill in with stats for each mask.
